```{python}
import seaborn as sns
penguins = sns.load_dataset("penguins")
```

```{python}
#| panel: input
from shiny import render, reactive, ui
ui.input_slider("bins", "Number of bins:", 5, 15, 10)
```

```{python}
@output
@render.plot
def histogram():
    sns.histplot(data = penguins, x ="flipper_length_mm", bins=input.bins())
```
